original_text: And when Pharaoh’s officials saw her, they praised her to Pharaoh, and she was taken into his palace.
korean_text: 바로의 고관들도 그를 보고 바로 앞에서 칭찬하므로 그 여인을 바로의 궁으로 이끌어들인지라

sentences.original_text: And when Pharaoh's officials saw her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바로의 관원들이 그녀를 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: and she was taken into his palace
